Interface BaseFilterProcessor.AsyncBodyBinder<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Arg type
All Superinterfaces:
ArgumentBinder<T, HttpRequest<?>>
Enclosing class:
BaseFilterProcessor<A extends Annotation>
public static interface BaseFilterProcessor.AsyncBodyBinder<T> extends ArgumentBinder<T, HttpRequest<?>>
Interface that signals to FilterRunner that we should wait for the request body to arrive before running this binder.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Jonas Konrad
